title: Understanding Data Classification
text: Data classification helps in organizing data based on its sensitivity and importance. This ensures that sensitive data is protected and managed appropriately.

title: Benefits of Data Classification
text: By classifying data, you can apply the right security measures, comply with regulations, and make informed business decisions.

hintAnswer: protecting your customers while growing your business
title: Choosing the Right Answer
text: Consider how data classification can impact both customer trust and business growth.
choices: protecting your customers while growing your business
eliminating privacy risks by deleting all data
